recipesJson.name: Mango Tango (Mango Juice)
recipesJson.author: QueerYourVape
recipesJson.description:
This is supposed to be a juicy, fleshy mango nectar with a dash of rind and tart lime to balance the sweetness of the mango.

WF Island Mango/TPA Mango make the actual fruit. WF Island Mango is very very sweet, and it needs a little body so TPA Mango helps there. I wouldn't use TPA Mango alone for mango, but if you want to get something out of it, 3% is a minimum.

WF African Horned Cucumber is here to give you juiciness. Where you would use TPA Dragonfruit or INW Cactus, you can use WF African Horned Cucumber, especially for yellow flavor profiles.

Cap Lemon Lime is the tartness. Lime loves mango in general, but here, the mango would be too ripe without it.

Enjoy, be queer & vape on !



[Photo Credit : Stylecraze]
